name: Hybrid of Time | Dress Up Game
name_original: Hybrid of Time | Dress Up Game
description:
Hybrid of Time
Design your own character with a mixture of gaming aesthetics from the 80s-2020s!

  • Please put the game in complete  Full-Screen before hitting "Play" as the lil' buttons like to jump around
  • Created for CSU Chico's 2021 Annual Game Jam!
  • Programming/Art: Sarah Vaughn
  • Sound Design: Chris Hunt

Thanks for playing!
